name: FirstGame (HottestMan)
description:
The goal of the game is to score as many kills as you can before the timer runs out.
Eat donuts for health, grab pistols for ammo (8 bullets in each clip, you gotta count them yourself!)
Have fun and enjoy!

Controls:

Move - WASD, arrow keys
Shoot - F, left mouse
Reload - R, right mouse
Dash - space, shift
Crouch - H, right ctrl
Melee - G, middle mouse
Pause menu - P, escape
